questions.question: What is the dominant color of the picture frame's visible exterior?
What appears to be the primary material used in constructing the frame?
Considering the frame's edges, what is the profile's shape?
Based on the visible surface, what is the overall texture of the frame?
Does the frame exhibit a glossy or matte finish?
What is the overall shape of the visible picture frame's opening?
Is there a noticeable bevel or any significant depth to the frame's edge?
Observing the visible area, is there any intricate or decorative molding present?
Considering the frame's construction, how many visible pieces comprise it?
What is the visible method of joining the frame's components (if any)?
Looking at the frame's surface, are there visible markings or a logo?
What is the style that best describes the design of this picture frame?
Describe the visible interior depth of the frame's border.
What is the visible apparent thickness of the frame's border?
Is the frame's color consistent across all visible surfaces?
